attributes.action: Make chipping, vaccinations and all other healthcare free for all pets
attributes.additional_details: So pet owners can get their pets healthcare without having to worry about their financial situations
attributes.background: Fund vets so pets can have free healthcare

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund a veterinary service for pets so people don’t have to pay vet fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700344
